description: This file defines a React component named StaffManagementView that manages and displays staff information for a store, including fetching data from services, filtering, and rendering UI elements such as tables, modals, and filters.

methods.name: loadInitialData
methods.description: Fetches initial staff data and branches if the user is an admin, setting loading states accordingly.

methods.name: handleAddStaff
methods.description: Handles the addition of a new staff member by calling the external service and refreshing the staff list.
